name: Cyber Space (Frame Project)
description:
«Cyber Space» is a unique in its genre free-to-play multiplayer third-person shooter thanks to the infinite upgrading of all in-game items.

Play in the world of the future with beautiful and colorful 3D graphics. Explore unique battle zones for dynamic cyborg fights.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR LOADOUT

Make your own loadout combining the best set of cyborg and weapons that suit you.

To improve the experience and domination on the battleground upgrade your cyborg, weapons and spaceship.

DESIGN YOUR STYLE

Make your equipment unique with lots of colour kits. Set colors to different parts of your cyborg, weapon or spaceship.

Take your place in PvP confrontation modes:

- Free For All (FFA) - classic Deathmatch game mode where players fights each others

- Team Deathmatch (TDM) - classic fight mode where two teams fights

Next features:

- Skills (Mines, Grenades, Heal fields, Shields, Turrets and drones)

- New game modes ("Capture point", "Capture the flag")

- Friends and cooperative fights

- More maps

- More playable characters and weapons
